name: cfe-multi-select
description: A component that displays items for two groups of selection boxes and allows swapping.

availableItems.description: The items that are available to be moved to the chosen list.

checkedAvailableItems.description: The items that are initially checked in the available list

chosenItems.description: The items that have already been chosen

checkedChosenItems.description: The items that are initially checked in the chosen list

displayWidth.description: The width setting for the component. Defaults to 700px.

addNewChosenItem.description: Add a new item to the chosen items list.

chosenItemsChanged.description: Triggered when an item is added or removed from the chosen list.

value.description: The items currently in the chosen list.
